scone.keyboard



auto getInputs();
Get all inputs since last function call.

Returns:
KeyEvent[], of all key presses since last call (Windows) Note: Can store a maximum of 128 key presses. This should however not be a problem, since 
getInputs()
should be called each game tick

auto clearInputs();
Clears all buffered inputs. Useful if you have a loading screen of some sort, and need to clear key presses once loaded.
